item.title: Let's Do Some Real World HTML Table Parsing with Beautiful Soup
item.description: Given that I’m continuing to chronicle my DH journeys here, I figured I’d showcase a little bit of my utilization of scraping data from a website with Beautiful Soup (docs are here). Doing some research for a favorite student of mine, I’ve been wandering around websites devoted to law school. One website here has a really fantastic little table on the page that has everything one could wantâ€”especially if one is a little behind on deadlines and trying to catch up a bit (i.
